short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enlarges the images upon hovering the mouse over it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is for internal SEPO group to be used to enlarge images or automatically load all the present images in Paragon in new tabs to help increase productivity.
